title: Amit Saha - Doing Math With Python [eBook (PDF)]
description: Amit Saha's Doing Math With Python is for people who already have elementary knowledge of Python, particularly functions, classes, and loops. Those intermediate Python learners will appreciate how well this book demonstrates the sort of problem solving that computers make possible. Basically, it's an introduction to the tools and techniques that Python developers use to work with numbers. Saha introduces the matplotlib and SymPy libraries and covers techniques for manipulating CSV files, which is important know-how for anyone working with data. Spanning the realms of algebra, geometry, calculus, and statistics, Doing Math With Python is a good read for programmers interested in mathematics, but is also a good read for beginners wanting to learn more about the applications of computer science
